home_description:
Thirsty? Take a drink. 
 This faucet is running on the Symbol testnet and dispenses up to %maxAmount XYM per account.
home_form_auth_description: To prevent faucet sniping, you must sign in with Twitter. We request read-only access.
home_body_text_p1: Done with your XYM? Send it back to the faucet. Remember, sharing is caring!
home_body_text_p2_1: If you’re looking to set up a voting node on Symbol (minimum 3,000,000 XYM), please send a request to
notification_error_account_high_balance: Your account balance is too high.
notification_error_fund_drains: Faucet balance not enough to pay out.
notification_error_transaction_pending: You have pending transactions, please wait for it to be confirmed.
